title: Optimizing Yield with Abel Finance
description: Discover Abel Finance, a yield optimizer protocol on Aptos that helps users maximize their DeFi returns by automatically compounding rewards, optimizing gas costs, and implementing advanced yield farming strategies.

tasks.title: Prepare for Yield Optimization
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Abel Finance

tasks.title: Abel Finance Basics
tasks.question: What is Abel Finance's primary function?
options: A yield optimizer that automates compounding and optimizes farming strategies
tasks.correctAnswer: A yield optimizer that automates compounding and optimizes farming strategies

tasks.title: Auto-Compounding
tasks.question: What is auto-compounding in the context of Abel Finance?
options: Automatically reinvesting earned rewards to increase the principal amount
Adding more funds manually to your position
tasks.correctAnswer: Automatically reinvesting earned rewards to increase the principal amount

tasks.title: Vaults
tasks.question: What are Abel Finance vaults?
options: Smart contracts that implement specific yield farming strategies
tasks.correctAnswer: Smart contracts that implement specific yield farming strategies

tasks.title: Performance Fees
tasks.description: Learn about how Abel's fee structure works
tasks.question: How does Abel Finance typically handle performance fees?
options: A percentage of the yield generated (not the principal)
Fixed monthly fees regardless of performance
tasks.correctAnswer: A percentage of the yield generated (not the principal)

tasks.title: Integrated Protocols
tasks.description: Understanding which protocols Abel works with
tasks.question: Which Aptos protocols might Abel Finance integrate with for yield strategies?
options: DEXes, lending protocols, and other DeFi platforms on Aptos
Only protocols created by the Abel team
tasks.correctAnswer: DEXes, lending protocols, and other DeFi platforms on Aptos

tasks.title: Yield Sources
tasks.question: What are typical sources of yield in Abel Finance vaults?
options: Trading fees, token rewards, interest from lending, and other DeFi incentives
tasks.correctAnswer: Trading fees, token rewards, interest from lending, and other DeFi incentives

tasks.title: Vault Tokens
tasks.question: How do users typically represent their share in an Abel Finance vault?
options: Receipt tokens that represent their proportional ownership of the vault
Only by remembering their deposit amount
tasks.correctAnswer: Receipt tokens that represent their proportional ownership of the vault

tasks.title: Risk Management
tasks.description: Learn about risks in yield optimization
tasks.question: What types of risks might be associated with using Abel Finance?
options: Smart contract risks, strategy risks, and underlying protocol risks
Only the risk of low returns
Only risks related to APT price fluctuations
tasks.correctAnswer: Smart contract risks, strategy risks, and underlying protocol risks

tasks.title: Implementation Technology
tasks.description: Understanding how Abel is built on Aptos
tasks.question: How is Abel Finance implemented on the Aptos blockchain?
options: As a centralized service with off-chain management
Using Move modules for on-chain vault strategies
tasks.correctAnswer: Using Move modules for on-chain vault strategies
